articles.author: Cointelegraph By Cyrus McNally
articles.title: Bitcoin fees plummet as mempool clears to zero
articles.description: The Bitcoin mempool cleared to zero this week, making it possible to get transactions confirmed in the upcoming block for 3 sat/byte fees, for the first time since mid-October.
